steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'File' tab in the top left corner of the window.
In the Word Options dialog box, click on 'Advanced' in the left sidebar.
Modify the value in the 'User name' field to the desired new name.
Click on the 'OK' button to save the changes.
Close the Word Options dialog box.
Verify that the user name has been successfully changed in the document.
